thread.section_title: Luxy Hair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Luxy Hair | www.luxyhair.com
thread.title: Kat Torre
thread.title_full: Luxy Hair reviewed by Kat Torre

author: Kat Torre
title: Kat Torre
text:
Since going blond from my natural ash brown, I have had trouble growing out my hair and so was looking for an option to gain not only some volume (I have quite bit of hair) but more importantly - length! I did my research, probably more than was needed, and looked into Luxy extensively both on their website, 3rd party reviews and also on social media.
Let me just say that they didn't disappoint! I received excellent service from start to finish. They helped me color match, since my hair is fairly two-toned, assisting me every step of the way. Their video tutorials are SUPER helpful for a girl who is not super hair savvy and is truly a tomboy at heart.
The quality is above and beyond what I expected, the color and texture blended seamlessly with my blown out hair and they held curls perfectly and didn't slip even once when I was wearing them for 10+ hours! No one I came into contact had even a clue that I was wearing extensions until I told them, and even then they had a hard time believing it!
If the team at Luxy can make a tomboy like me feel glamorous and knowledgeable when it comes to hair extensions (they are ridiculously easy and quick to put in), then the sky is the limit with what they can accomplish.
